snippet.title: Scarred - Official Release Date Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Scarred gets a creepy new trailer and a release date reveal. Watch the Scarred trailer for another look at this first-person atmospheric horror puzzle game where you must uncover the truth about one of your schoolmates before it’s too late. Traverse a world of nightmares inspired by nostalgic Singaporean architecture as you fight to survive. Scarred will be available on PC (via Steam) on March 6, 2025
